channel.title: Gmaul bug?
channel.description:
the jagex page says that the gmaul special att is it attacks immediately when u click the special. however ive heard rumors that theres a bug that if u click really really fast, then it prevents the opponent from hitting back at all.
can anyone verify this?

item.title: Gmaul bug?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:3, topic:69436”]Its been fixed for ages lol.
This was back when it was ‘newish’[/quote]
It was fixed like a month or two after it came out?

Read full topic

item.title: Gmaul bug?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I hate the eat and die bug.
I staked I ate a lob and died. Waste of a lob. =X XD

Read full topic

item.title: Gmaul bug?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:69436”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=102027.msg1034659#msg1034659 date=1174501329]
The only bug I know with it, is if you attack then do both specs and switch weapon REALLY fast you can do 4 hits in a second.
[/quote]
Did they fix that one?
If not I’m gonna have to try it[/quote]

I wouldn’t know, I did it a few times but I didn’t abuse it.

Another bug is if you can switch weapon while doing d mace spec, you can hit significantly higher.(do 4 specs and just as you click last spec switch weapon)

Read full topic
